component.alias: Absolute Nexos Digital Media 8x8 HDMI Matrix, NDS-DM88
component.notes:
For more information about this product, please visit: 'http://www.absolute-acoustics.com.br/Integration/Matrizes/index.html'.
When using backpanel IR connector, use 'SerialPWM' connection at Blueprint and cable pinout shown below:
Stereo Male P2 connector
^ | | -> '+' (to Savant Controller) - | | -> '-' (to Savant Controller) - | | -> Do not use ----- | | | |
